pr_title: Do not create an Evaluator in ManifestGroup unless the file filter is used

timeline.message: Do not create an Evaluator in ManifestGroup unless the file filter is used.

timeline.author: HeartSaVioR

replies.bodyText: We instantiate it above so that we only create one and share it for all of the evaluations. It just cuts down on Evaluator creation and garbage collection.
replies.author: rdblue
